characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the end of any phase in which this model suffers any unsaved wounds or mortal wounds, roll a D6. On a roll of 6, this model immediately makes a shooting attack as if it were your Shooting phase if there no enemies within 1", or a piles in and fights as if it were in the Fight phase if there are enemies within 1". If there is no visible target within range, nothing happens.
